project.name: Office
project.author: scarabeus
project.description: The office subproject manages the office implementations and related packages in Portage.

longdescription.p: The office subproject manages the office implementations, required libraries and accessories in Portage. This includes openoffice, libreoffice and their binary counterparts.

goals.p: The subproject aims to support various office implementations and add-ons. Increasing the modularity of monolithic builds and making configuration easier are part of its current work.

body.p: If you want to get involved with improving Gentoo's office experience, we'd like to hear from you! The main thing you'll want to do is be active on Gentoo's Bugzilla. Also please join office project members in #gentoo-office on irc.freenode.net.
